versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Categorizes expenses into meaningful categories

schema.prompt:
You are a financial categorization expert. Analyze the following expense data and categorize each transaction.

Expense Data:
{{input.rawExpenses}}

Custom Categories (if provided):
{{input.customCategories}}

Time Period:
{{input.timeframe}}

Instructions:
1. Categorize each expense into standard categories: Food & Dining, Transportation, Shopping, Bills & Utilities, Entertainment, Healthcare, Education, Income, Other
2. If custom categories are provided, use those in addition to standard ones
3. Identify merchant patterns for consistent categorization
4. Flag any unusual or potentially miscategorized items
5. Calculate totals for each category

Provide output as a JSON object with:
- categorizedExpenses: Array of expenses with assigned categories
- categoryTotals: Object with total spending per category
- uncategorizedItems: Array of items that couldn't be reliably categorized

translations.name: Expense Categorizer
translations.description: Intelligently categorizes financial transactions into standard and custom expense categories for budget tracking and analysis.
translations.instructions: Provide your expense data as a JSON array or structured text. Optionally include custom categories specific to your needs. The routine will categorize each expense, calculate category totals, and flag any items that need manual review.
